articles.author: Alex Schiffer
articles.title: Mark Cuban Increases His Indiana Football Spending for Transfer Portal - Front Office Sports
articles.description: Cuban told FOS that he gave for a second straight year after never previously backing Indiana’s sports teams.
articles.content:
Indiana footballs dream season has helped land another big donation from the schools wealthiest alumnus. 
Billionaire and Mavericks minority owner Mark Cuban, a 1981 IU graduate, told Front Office S… [+1639 chars]

articles.title: Connelly breaks down Miami-Ole Miss, Oregon-Indiana - ESPN
articles.description: Our deep dive into the semifinals dissects the matchups that will determine who moves on to the title game.
articles.content: It has been 29 years since a college football team won its first national title. There's about a two-in-three chance it will happen over the next couple of weeks; and if it doesn't, we'll have to set… [+35236 chars]
